columns.name: LONG_DESCRIPTION_2
columns.comment: Detailed description of a product (second line)

columns.name: WITHDRAWN_DATE
columns.comment: The date the record was withdrawn from service

columns.name: STOCK_UNIT
columns.comment: The normal transaction units for the product

columns.name: DEFAULT_PURCH_UNIT
columns.comment: Default unit used for purchasing - Relates to PRODUCT_UNIT

columns.name: DEFAULT_SALES_UNIT
columns.comment: Default unit used for sales orders -Relates to PRODUCT_UNIT

columns.name: HEIGHT
columns.comment: height, held in centimetres of stock unit

columns.name: WIDTH
columns.comment: Width, held in centimetres of stock unit

columns.name: LENGTH
columns.comment: Length of a product, held in centimetres of stock unit

columns.name: DIM_ENTRY_UNIT
columns.comment: Unit that dimensions were entered in: 0 mm, 1 Cm, 2 metre

columns.name: VOLUME
columns.comment: Volume, held in cubic centimetres of stock unit

columns.name: WEIGHT
columns.comment: Weight of a product, held in kilos in weight entry unit

columns.name: WEIGHT_ENTRY_UNIT
columns.comment: Unit that weight was entered in: 1 kilo, 0 gramme, 2 tonne

columns.name: WARRANTY
columns.comment: The warranty period for a product, in days.

columns.name: PRODUCT_SOLD
columns.comment: 1 = Product may be sold 0 = Product may not be sold

columns.name: PRODUCT_PURCHASED
columns.comment: 1 = Product may be purchase 0 = Product may not be purchased

columns.name: PRODUCT_STOCKED
columns.comment: 1 = Product may be stocked 0 = Product may not be stocked

columns.name: KIT_PRODUCT
columns.comment: 0 = Not a kit ; 1= part of a kit

columns.name: SPECIAL_PRODUCT
columns.comment: 0= Not a special product, 1= special product

columns.name: SERIAL_CONTROL
columns.comment: 0=no serial control,1=serial control,2=serial cont. on issue

columns.name: STANDARD_COST
columns.comment: Standard cost of a product per stock unit

columns.name: CREATION_DATE
columns.comment: Date on which the record was first created

columns.name: PICTURE
columns.comment: Name of a file containing a picture

columns.name: MANUAL_ALLOCATION
columns.comment: 0 if manual allocation required; 1 if automatic allocation.

columns.name: CHANGE_USER
columns.comment: The user entering or last updating the record

columns.name: STANDARD_PRICE
columns.comment: The standard selling price for a product per stock unit

columns.name: TECH_NOTES_NUMBER
columns.comment: Foreign key to TEXT_STORAGE table-relates to technical notes

columns.name: LAST_USED
columns.comment: The date the entity was last used

columns.name: PRODUCT_KEY1
columns.comment: 1st product key - A means of categorising products

columns.name: PRODUCT_KEY2
columns.comment: 2nd product key - A means of categorising products

columns.name: PRODUCT_KEY3
columns.comment: 3rd product key - A means of categorising products

columns.name: PRODUCT_KEY4
columns.comment: 4th product key - A means of categorising products

columns.name: PRODUCT_KEY5
columns.comment: 5th product key - A means of categorising products

columns.name: PRODUCT_KEY6
columns.comment: 6th product key - A means of categorising products

columns.name: GROUP_COSTING
columns.comment: 0 =exclude from group costing, 1= include in group costing

columns.name: FIXED_PRICE
columns.comment: 1=default to not fixed but user may over ride 2=default to fixed but user may not over ride 3-default to not fixed user may not over ride 4=default to fixed user may not over ride

columns.name: PRINT_KIT_INVOICE
columns.comment: 0=Print ONLY the kit on the sales invoice, 1= 'Print the kit product AND components

columns.name: TARIFF_CODE
columns.comment: product key 7 - has a fixed name

columns.name: SPECIAL_TEXT
columns.comment: text storage reference number for special text

columns.name: MAIN_PRODUCT
columns.comment: 0=not main product,1=main product -for item line association

columns.name: DEFINED_KEY_1
columns.comment: User defined field can appear on stock or sales button of product maintenance

columns.name: DEFINED_KEY_2
columns.comment: User defined field can appear on stock or sales button of product maintenance

columns.name: DEFINED_KEY_3
columns.comment: User defined field can appear on stock or sales button of product maintenance

columns.name: DEFINED_KEY_4
columns.comment: User defined field can appear on stock or sales button of product maintenance

columns.name: DEFINED_KEY_5
columns.comment: User defined field can appear on stock or sales button of product maintenance

columns.name: DEFINED_KEY_6
columns.comment: User defined field can appear on stock or sales button of product maintenance

columns.name: MAX_QUANTITY
columns.comment: Max order quantity in default sales units

columns.name: REORDER_QUANTITY
columns.comment: Re-order quantity in default sales units

columns.name: BUILD_TEXT
columns.comment: Text ref entry for build instructions for manufactured item

columns.name: LINKED_SERVICE
columns.comment: 1=Item is linked to a service product,0=not linked

columns.name: LINKED_SERVICE_PRODUCT
columns.comment: Product may be linked to a service product

columns.name: MAIN_PRICING_UNIT
columns.comment: Unit code of the main pricing unit

columns.name: BATCH_PUTAWAY
columns.comment: 1= unique batch putaway control, 0 = non-unique batch putaway

columns.name: BACK_ORDERS
columns.comment: 0=back orders allowed, 1=not allowed, 2=not allowed nut back to backs allowed, 3=take system default

columns.name: SUPERSEDED
columns.comment: 0=not superseded. 1 =superseded. 2= top of the supersession list.
